programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: Security officials at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport work non-stop to uncover smugglers. A man conceals cocaine in the structure of his suitcase. He breaks down when he tells his mother hes been arrested. A passenger to Spain carries drugs in unmarked food packages. A couple want to travel to Mexico with an unusual pet. A woman bound for Mexico fears she carries contraband disguised as a gift. Cocaine-contaminated olives.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Inside The Mega Twister
programme.desc: The tornado that struck El Reno, Oklahoma, on May 31st, 2013, defied superlatives. It was the largest, one of the fastest, and for storm chasers the most lethal twister ever recorded on Earth. In a unique documentary, professionals and witnesses unravel the tornado and tell its story. This is no typical storm-chasing documentary. Among those whose lives it claimed was Tim Samaras, revered as one of the most experienced and cautious scientists studying tornadoes. This storm, however was unlike any he had witnessed before. The storm was also probably the best documented in history. In the wake of the tragedy, Dr Anton Seimon gathered all the video footage available of the storm and organised it into a searchable database. He pinpointed the exact location of every camera pointing at the storm, and used lightning patterns to synchronise every frame of video down to the second. Combined with many first-hand accounts and harrowing videos from scientists and amateur storm chasers, and accompanied by some state-of-the-art CGI animations, the result is an extraordinary and unprecedented journey through the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Superstorm New York: What Really Happened
programme.desc: Experts investigate the cause behind the storm that ravaged New York, as well as scrutinise the US governments response plans.

programme.title: Top Ten Natural Disasters
programme.desc: In this 2 hour, National Geographic special, 10 world experts formulate a list of the most important natural disasters of all time. Using eye witness video, historical archive and cutting edge CGI, they not only reveal the key moments that turned a natural phenomenon into a human catastrophe, but explain why the disaster theyve selected is a genuine game-changer, worthy of its place as a one of the Top Ten Natural Disasters.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The Royal Navys battle with Bismarck is a pivotal point in the Second World War. If Bismarck had succeeded in attacking the British convoy system, then Britain would probably have been forced to surrender, leaving no bridgehead for an Anglo-American liberation of Europe. In losing Bismarck, the Germans lost their opportunity to defeat Britain and turn the tide of war. Naval historian Andrew Lambert has studied this famous sea battle and sheds light on the reasons for Bismarcks fate. He believes the sinking follows a catalogue of errors on both sides, and ultimately he finds fault with the core German war strategy.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. Each week we show between 50 and 60 clips of misadventure - ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes. Each episode will feature several themes such as motorbike drifting, wakeboarding or attempting to fly drones. Clips are paused, re-wound, and re-played as we analyse exactly what went wrong and why. Richard Hammond explains the physics, chemistry and biology at play, by presenting forensic detail to explain the stupidity that resulted in failure. Hell study everything from acceleration to aero dynamics, fluid pressure to combustion and human anatomy to flammability. This is misadventure explained. This is The Science of Stupid.

programme.title: Ghost Ships of the Great Lakes: Lost Beneath the Waves
programme.desc: The tempestuous Great Lakes are full of wrecks lost to the depths and time. In this update, new science reveals some of the exciting Great Lakes ship discoveries over the last decade, and allows for the exploration and recovery of recently discovered wrecks, including a mysterious group of ships that havent been seen since 1914.

programme.title: Lost in the Jungle
programme.desc: A deadly plane crash deep in the Colombian rainforest strands four young siblings to survive 40 unimaginable days alone. For the first time, the children tell their story, revealing their epic fight to stay alive as a dramatic rescue mission unfolds around them, uniting Indigenous trackers and the military in a race against time in this gripping true story of survival, courage and hope.

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: a Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: In his most personal documentary yet, Chris turns the camera on his own family after his dads recent Alzheimers diagnosis. They embark on a road trip into their past, exploring the science of social connection and how it can support memory function. They revisit meaningful places and faces, capturing it all as a home movie, and reviving treasured recollections.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europes finest cultural and geographical landmarks as youve never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent - a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: In this special episode, well take a spectacular aerial tour highlighting Europes engineering prowess from a vantage point that is rarely seen. From above, well visit some of the most visually stunning regions across all of Europe. Our flying cameras unveil the impenetrable defenses of Waless biggest castle, a jaw-dropping window cleaning operation in Benidorm, Europes foremost astronomical observatory, the construction of the continents largest snow village, and a giant bridge traveling across the sea. Well introduce you to the innovators responsible for maintaining these structures and how these engineering masterpieces have shaped the European communities you see today.

programme.title: World Eats Bread
programme.desc: In Guatemala, where the ancient Maya believed the gods made humans out of corn, the tortilla is the heart of every meal. But despite its storied history, this humble flatbread and the women who make it have long been taken for granted. Now, a network of chefs, farmers and activists is fighting to give the tortilla its due, and boost their nations pride in the process.

programme.title: World Eats Bread
programme.desc: The Fertile Crescent is where the seeds of bread were first planted millenia ago - and to this day Turkey eats more of it than just about any other nation. This is the tale of two of their most beloved loaves: simit, the fuel that powers the thriving city of Istanbul, and Ramadan pide, a once-a-year delicacy that represents compassion and generosity - even in trying times.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: November 27, 1987. A 747 Combi is on a routine flight toward South Africa when the cabin begins filling with smoke. Passengers struggle to breathe as crew members attempt to fight a fire in the cargo hold. After the plane disappears in the Indian Ocean, an unprecedented recovery operation is launched to locate and raise the wreckage from the ocean floor. Rumours swirl. Did illegal weapons bring down Flight 295?

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: On a quiet Sunday morning in 1941 the pride of the US Navy rode calmly at anchor in the island paradise of Hawaii, far away from the war raging in Europe. That calm was abruptly shattered by the arrival of Imperial Japans carrier taskforce that, in an unprecedented surprise attack, killed thousands and destroyed the American battleships that stood between Japan and its desire for a Pacific empire. This "day of infamy" seemed to be the most successful pre-emptive strike in history and a disaster for the United States. But was it? Seconds from Disaster takes a fresh look at one of historys greatest events and investigates whether the attack was in fact a fatal blow to Japans quest for victory.

programme.title: Superstorm New York: What Really Happened
programme.desc: Experts investigate the cause behind the storm that ravaged New York, as well as scrutinise the US governments response plans.

programme.title: Lost Cities of the Bible
programme.desc: Nineveh and Babylon were two superpowers of the ancient world but for the writers of the Bible they were the cities of sin. Why do they have such poor reputations in the Old Testament and what were these cities really like? Our cameras have rare access to discoveries at Nineveh, in modern Mosul, the setting for the story of Jonah and the whale. Here archaeologists are rebuilding the citys mighty gates and piecing together lost wonders destroyed by Islamic State. At Babylon, we follow specialists restoring the Ishtar Gate, built by Nebuchadnezzar II, one of the most notorious tyrants of the Old Testament. The rivalry between Nineveh and Babylon determined the fate of the ancient world could their conquests also lie behind their terrible reputations in the Bible?

programme.title: Lost Cities of the Bible
programme.desc: 6000 years ago, a people called the Sumerians built the worlds first cities in Southern Iraq, great metropolises like Uruk and Ur. The first westerners to explore these ruined cities were inspired by stories about them in the Bible but what was the world of Genesis really like? Our cameras have unprecedented access to new discoveries that reveal the extraordinary achievements of the Sumerian civilization and how its legacy influenced the later Biblical writers. At the ancient city of Girsu, archaeologists have unearthed the oldest bridge ever found in the world and a set of mysterious ruins that could transform how we see the rise of civilization. Why did southern Iraq play a key role in the Old Testament and did the collapse of the Sumerian world influence one of the greatest stories ever told Noah and the Great Flood? Our cameras have unprecedented access to new discoveries that reveal the extraordinary achievements of the Sumerian civilization and how its legacy influenced the later Biblical writers. At the ancient city of Girsu, archaeologists have unearthed the oldest bridge ever found in the world and a set of mysterious ruins that could transform how we see the rise of civilization. Why did southern Iraq play a key role in the Old Testament and did the collapse of the Sumerian world influence one of the greatest stories ever told Noah and the Great Flood?

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: King Solomon is one of the most famous names in the Bible—known for being wise and wealthy beyond imagination. But there is little evidence of his reign, and the age in which he lived remains a mystery. Now, archaeologists are excavating neighboring ancient kingdoms to make groundbreaking new discoveries about the long-lost world of this legendary King. Immersive CGI brings his story to life.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: King Herod is reviled as one of the most evil characters in the Bible, responsible for the horrific "massacre of the innocents" in his efforts to kill the infant Jesus Christ. But later historians coin him "Herod the Great." Now, immersive CGI and new archaeological discoveries—on land and deep underwater—reveal the truth about this Biblical villain.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Every year, thousands of train crashes and devastating plane disasters occur worldwide. From hijackings to technological failures, these incidents highlight the inherent dangers of travel. Despite daily advancements, a single mistake can lead to catastrophic outcomes. Join us as we explore the 10 most significant air crashes and train accidents, uncovering the tragic events that capture global attention and impact countless lives.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did a Titan II nuclear missile explode in its Arkansas silo? What flaw made the sinking of the ferry Estonia the worst European maritime disaster since Titanic? Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

programme.title: World Eats Bread
programme.desc: In the U.S., where Wonderbread reigns supreme, sourdough goes against the grain -- and nowhere does it better than the counterculture bastion of Californias Bay Area. For our bakers, making naturally leavened bread isnt just a career, its a way to find fulfillment on their own terms. But living the bread life comes with its own challenges.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Follow the incredible sweet trajectory - from grape to jar - of Welchs Concord Grape Jam; enjoy these savory grandma-perfected-and-approved pierogies; and visit the amazing factory that creates and packages the worlds most flipping delicious chocolate-covered pretzels

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Discover the secret to a perfect bowl of tasty ramen noodles - in under three minutes; it takes an "octopus," a "guillotine," and an "enrober" to make this classic and delicious American candy bar; and every loaf of Challah egg bread is lovingly braided and baked by hand.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Find out how humble whole potatoes are transformed into spicy, miniature Mexi-Fries; these chocolate-almond toffees have a connection to Hollywood royalty; and this California distillery has perfected the art of making the long-fabled alcoholic drink of absinthe.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: The incredible, epic story of the humble sliced black olive; this fruit and veggie ice pop is like a guilt-free, non-melting smoothie on a stick; and find out what it takes to produce millions of cookie chips - a distant relative of the potato chip - every week.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: Kings Day is the busiest day of the year at Amsterdam Central Station. While Ticket and Services employee Alexandra, and Station Manager Rene try to steer the crowds in the right direction, Assistant Manager Michel is busy coordinating the flow of goods due to a broken freight elevator. Meanwhile, officers Menno and Carolien revive a girl who has fallen ill.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: The station is undergoing an impressive transformation, with the old railway bridge being replaced by a gigantic steel structure. Superintendent Leon faces a huge challenge in this complex operation. Security and Services staff accompany two undocumented migrants to the Asylum Seekers Application Centre, while Gusta helps travelers recover lost property in the Lost and Found department.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP MIA finds a package of ecstasy in the mail; HSI conducts a controlled delivery leading to a stakeout and arrest. CBP at LAX monitor travelers arriving for a popular music festival where there is known drug use. CBP JFK searches a passenger with possible connections to known drug dealers. After poking holes through his story, officers decide to take him for an x-ray to find out the truth once and for all.

programme.title: Laoshan: Chinas Holy Mountain
programme.desc: The story of Chinas largest coastal mountain, the mystical heart of Chinese culture. The story of Chinas largest coastal mountain, a beautiful, historic, mystical spot where ancient religions and traditional culture meet and flourish. Laoshan is Chinas largest coastal mountain. It is home to some of the earliest sites for the ancient religions, Taoism and Buddhism, and their temples flourish today. Its mystical, magical and beautiful, and it has always offered prosperity to its locals. It has attracted visitors, real and legendary, for thousands of years, and there is little that has happened in Chinas history that isnt somehow connected to Laoshan.

programme.title: Laoshan: Chinas Holy Mountain
programme.desc: The story of Chinas largest coastal mountain, the mystical heart of Chinese culture. It has attracted visitors, real and legendary, for thousands of years, and there is little that has happened in Chinas history that isnt somehow connected to Laoshan.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Guarded by the Terracotta Warriors, the tomb of the First Emperor is so revered that it has never been opened. But now, for the first time ever, Sam Willis and his team of experts use new laser drone technology to investigate. What they reveal has never been seen before, and it provides new insight into what lies inside the tomb itself, as they piece together the Emperors vast mausoleum - an entire, stunning city of the dead.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Dr Allan Maca explores a newly discovered ancient megacity that 4000 years ago was one of the biggest on the planet. Its people created amazing Maya-like carvings like nothing ever found in China before. Theres also grizzly evidence of human sacrifice on an unprecedented scale. This lost civilisation changes everything we thought we knew about the origins of China, but why, after 500 years, did they vanish? Allan and his team investigate ancient cataclysms to try to solve this great mystery.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: At its height in the early 16th century, the temples and palaces of Cuzco overflowed with fine goods and precious metals. The wealth of the Incas even helped inspire the legend of El Dorado. Meet the most powerful Inca emperor: Huayna Capac, known for his violent and ruthless rule. Over his 30-year reign, Huayna Capac spent long periods campaigning in the north of his empire, conquering new lands and suppressing rebellions. With an iron grip, he maintained control, enforced mandatory labor, exported agricultural technologies, relocated hundreds of thousands of people across the Andes, and centralized South Americas production in Cuzco.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: How did Rome rise to dominate so much of the ancient world? Off the coast of Sicily, investigators discover traces of a crucial naval battle. Using divers, an underwater robot and a crane, they haul a long lost battleship relic to the surface. In Terracina, south of Rome, a team of archaeologists dig inside an ancient mountaintop temple, and in Carthage, Tunisia, clues reveal how one deadly rivalry tilted the scales of power in favour of Rome.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The series that follows international teams of archaeologists as they embark on a season of excavations to unravel the secrets of life in the Roman Empire. How did the Colosseum - an arena for bloody gladiatorial battles - become the greatest symbol of the Roman Empire? Archaeologists venture into the Colosseums ruins, and launch digs across the Empire, to hunt for clues. As teams descend into hidden tunnels and unearth long-lost amphitheatres in Tuscany and Britain, they piece together the surprising truth about Romes iconic Colosseum.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes takes an incredible journey from the Nile Delta to the shores of Lake Nasser uncovering the pivotal moments and breathtaking achievements of one of the greatest civilisations the world has ever known - the ancient Egyptians - as she counts down her Top 10 Treasures of Egypt. In this first instalment, Bettany meets the Egyptologists solving a 3,000-year-old murder mystery and visits the temple walls that tell the story of Egypts final female pharaoh - Cleopatra.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes takes an incredible journey from the Nile Delta to the shores of Lake Nasser uncovering the pivotal moments and breathtaking achievements of one of the greatest civilisations the world has ever known - the ancient Egyptians - as she counts down her Top 10 Treasures of Egypt. In this second episode, Bettany heads towards her number one unearthing the glittering, golden treasures of the pharaohs and the truly epic monuments they built for their spiritual afterlives.

programme.title: Hidden Gems of Turkey
programme.desc: Documentary series from National Geographic searching for Turkeys unique hidden gems. Presenter Andrew Evans travels from East to West, exploring the countrys ancient sites and secrets. Rich in history and culture, Turkey possesses some of the most iconic architecture in the world, and the series reveals both its vibrant imperialistic past and intriguing recent history. This three-part journey uncovers the historic Aegean and Anatolian regions, with a whole episode focusing on Turkeys mesmerising capital; Istanbul. From culinary delights to ancient archaeology, mystic landscapes to forgotten music, Evans experiences a world both old and new, East meets West, in this thrilling exploration. With invaluable help and information provided by local ambassadors, Hidden Gems of Turkey explains what makes this beautiful nation quite so special.

programme.title: Hidden Gems of Turkey
programme.desc: This exciting documentary series will reveal Turkeys gems, a country with plentiful ancient architecture, rich in history, culture, food and natural wonder but also unique experiences that our host will experience through his own personal point of view. From Kars to Istanbul, a Nat Geo Explorer will travel from East to West to vividly portray an ancient land and a modern nation. He will delve into Turkey to show his findings to the world, uncovering the countrys secrets by meeting local "ambassadors" who will unveil its very rich past, but also its thrilling recent history. The 3 episodes Turkeys Hidden Gems series is born as a thrilling trip, including episodes ranging from archaeology to gastronomy, from historic heritage to amazing experiences, from incredible landscapes to music, making the series a varied and rich watching experience for the viewer. One of the episodes will be focused on Istanbul and the other two will travel through Anatolia and Aegean uncovering some of its most secret sites.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: At its height in the early 16th century, the temples and palaces of Cuzco overflowed with fine goods and precious metals. The wealth of the Incas even helped inspire the legend of El Dorado. Meet the most powerful Inca emperor: Huayna Capac, known for his violent and ruthless rule. Over his 30-year reign, Huayna Capac spent long periods campaigning in the north of his empire, conquering new lands and suppressing rebellions. With an iron grip, he maintained control, enforced mandatory labor, exported agricultural technologies, relocated hundreds of thousands of people across the Andes, and centralized South Americas production in Cuzco.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: From the arrival of Francisco Pizarro in South America to the fall of the Inca Empire, less than 10 years passed. But how could such a powerful empire commanding over 30,000 soldiers collapse so quickly to just 200 Spanish conquistadors? The tragic fate of the last three Inca sovereigns, three brothers, each played a decisive role in the brutal downfall. The conquistadors were better equipped, master tacticians, and aided by rebellious Indigenous peoples. Some Incas resisted, but within a few decades, the Spanish wiped out the legacy of the Sons of the Sun. Thanks to the latest scientific advances and ultra-realistic 3D reconstructions—from Cuzco to the Chilean desert, via Cajamarca, and the Pacific coast—this is the brutal fall of the Empire of the Sun.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Guarded by the Terracotta Warriors, the tomb of the First Emperor is so revered that it has never been opened. But now, for the first time ever, Sam Willis and his team of experts use new laser drone technology to investigate. What they reveal has never been seen before, and it provides new insight into what lies inside the tomb itself, as they piece together the Emperors vast mausoleum - an entire, stunning city of the dead.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Dr Allan Maca explores a newly discovered ancient megacity that 4000 years ago was one of the biggest on the planet. Its people created amazing Maya-like carvings like nothing ever found in China before. Theres also grizzly evidence of human sacrifice on an unprecedented scale. This lost civilisation changes everything we thought we knew about the origins of China, but why, after 500 years, did they vanish? Allan and his team investigate ancient cataclysms to try to solve this great mystery.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes takes an incredible journey from the Nile Delta to the shores of Lake Nasser uncovering the pivotal moments and breathtaking achievements of one of the greatest civilisations the world has ever known - the ancient Egyptians - as she counts down her Top 10 Treasures of Egypt. In this first instalment, Bettany meets the Egyptologists solving a 3,000-year-old murder mystery and visits the temple walls that tell the story of Egypts final female pharaoh - Cleopatra.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes takes an incredible journey from the Nile Delta to the shores of Lake Nasser uncovering the pivotal moments and breathtaking achievements of one of the greatest civilisations the world has ever known - the ancient Egyptians - as she counts down her Top 10 Treasures of Egypt. In this second episode, Bettany heads towards her number one unearthing the glittering, golden treasures of the pharaohs and the truly epic monuments they built for their spiritual afterlives.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: How did Rome rise to dominate so much of the ancient world? Off the coast of Sicily, investigators discover traces of a crucial naval battle. Using divers, an underwater robot and a crane, they haul a long lost battleship relic to the surface. In Terracina, south of Rome, a team of archaeologists dig inside an ancient mountaintop temple, and in Carthage, Tunisia, clues reveal how one deadly rivalry tilted the scales of power in favour of Rome.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The series that follows international teams of archaeologists as they embark on a season of excavations to unravel the secrets of life in the Roman Empire. How did the Colosseum - an arena for bloody gladiatorial battles - become the greatest symbol of the Roman Empire? Archaeologists venture into the Colosseums ruins, and launch digs across the Empire, to hunt for clues. As teams descend into hidden tunnels and unearth long-lost amphitheatres in Tuscany and Britain, they piece together the surprising truth about Romes iconic Colosseum.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: War...Weather...and human error have led to some of the worst maritime disasters in US history. But imagine if we could empty the oceans, letting the water drain away to reveal these secrets of Americas sea floor. Pearl Harbor, who fired the first shot? What are the dangerous forces that make Alcatraz and the San Francisco Bay so deadly? And how did drilling for oil result in one of the biggest environmental disasters in US history? Drained dry we reveal these sunken mysteries along Americas shores.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Lion Air Flight 610 was just 13 minutes into flight from Jakarta, Indonesia, when it plunged into the sea on 29 October 2018. This was the first fatal aviation accident for the 737 MAX, killing all 189 people on board. Just five months later, tragedy struck again on 10 March 2019, when the 737 Max serving Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302, crashed approximately six minutes after takeoff from Ethiopia, again killing all passengers and crew. What followed was an intense investigation into what caused these two devastating crashes. In this episode former NTSB investigators talk us through how these tragedies could have been avoided..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Man Among Cheetahs
programme.desc: Wildlife cinematographer Bob Poole journeys to a rugged and picturesque corner of Kenya to capture rare moments of the worlds fastest predators. He follows a fearless mother cheetah as she tries to raise her cubs and teach them the skills they need to survive. A

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. Its feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Berties career.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs Cheetah
programme.desc: Caught on tape in Africas wild Serengeti is a stunning act of violence between two top predators. Three cheetahs are brutally attacked by two male lions - the first time an attack like this has ever been filmed. Now, filmmaker Leo Kuenkel, who witnessed the attack, is trying to make sense of it. Was this a once-in-a-lifetime "perfect storm" event? Or do these iconic African cats have a deep-set, sinister reason to fight to the death?

programme.title: Man Among Cheetahs
programme.desc: Wildlife cinematographer Bob Poole journeys to a rugged and picturesque corner of Kenya to capture rare moments of the worlds fastest predators. He follows a fearless mother cheetah as she tries to raise her cubs and teach them the skills they need to survive. A

programme.title: Wild Lapland
programme.desc: A lyrical portrayal of the enchanting, wild creatures who call Lapland home.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. Its feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Berties career.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Asias Weirdest
programme.desc: Asias natural world is full of weird wildlife. The largest continent on Earth has more than its fair share of peculiar plants and abnormal animals, and this documentary series delves deep into its wild landscapes to reveal some of the strangest species on offer. Expect the unexpected in places like no other, as the series heads to extraordinary locations including the rugged islands of Indonesia and the grasslands of Mongolia.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri, a first-time Mom, is forced to add strategy to speed in order to avoid predators, feed her cubs and steer them successfully to adulthood

programme.title: Race to Winter
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. As the first light of spring touches snow-covered landscapes, the race begins. Across fjords, forests, mountains and tundra, animals emerge from hiding to take advantage of summers fleeting generosity.

programme.title: Asias Weirdest
programme.desc: Asias natural world is full of weird wildlife. programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri, a first-time Mom, is forced to add strategy to speed in order to avoid predators, feed her cubs and steer them successfully to adulthood

programme.title: The Way Of the Cheetah
programme.desc: Set in Kenya, the story tells of how Immani protects her 4 cubs against other male cheetah and other predators. By Dereck and Beverly Joubert.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. Along the way, she finds many other "odd ones" - animals that have come up with all kinds of strange adaptations so they can survive in the forest of Borneo. Lucy finds dung beetles in action - eating dung; frogs that fly; a tarsier, with eyes that are bigger than its brain; and the wooly bat that makes its home is a carnivorous plant

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South Americas Weirdest Animals dives into the depths of the South American wild to investigate the cast of misfits, the oddities, the weird, the eccentric and the truly bizarre. The landscape here is truly one of a kind. So, the animals have evolved accordingly. In the South American wild, strange problems gave rise to even stranger solutions.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Typically South Africa is known for the Big Five: lions, leopards, buffalo, elephants and rhinos. But not for Lucy Cooke, advocate and avenger for the lesser-known and unloved animals of the world. Lucys on a hunt for the more enigmatic Freaky Five: Cape vultures, sungazer girdled lizards, golden-brown baboon tarantulas, ground pangolins, and chacma baboons. The Freaky Five are all important to South Africans and their traditions. Mystical and mysterious, these five animals represent a side of South African culture that the tourists and conservation donors both often overlook. But Lucy Cooke is on a mission to change all of that!

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Cannibal Sharks
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Cannibal Sharks pulls in two of the worlds leading shark experts to unpack and analyze the mounting evidence that shark-on-shark attacks happen a lot more than we ever realized.

programme.title: Perfect Predator
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. From their massive size, strength and stamina to their finely tuned hunting skills and unrelenting will to survive, sharks have evolved to be the perfect predator. But how do they do it?

programme.title: Sharks of the North
programme.desc: Sightings of great white sharks have been on the rise in Atlantic Canada. Scientist Alanna Canaran is determined to dispel fear of sharks in Nova Scotians.

programme.title: Return of the White Shark
programme.desc: Cape Cod - Americas Playground - is a newly emerging hotspot for a top predator. Great Whites are appearing in increasing numbers, when for centuries there were none.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami. Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili. Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Suņi uzzina, ka Celtne ir slepena skeitošanas zvaigzne! Bet, būvējot skeitparku, viņiem jārisina problēma ar cementa maisījumu. // Pilsētā ieradīsies Čārdžera mīļākā dziedātāja Sjerra Spīdošā... Ja suņi spēs uzbūvēt tuneli viņas turnejas autobusam!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod apburošu aksolotla mazuli. Viņi dodas ceļā, lai nogādātu mazo nerātni mājās. Lielais Sarkanais Cālis iekļūst milzīgā burbulī, kurš viņu nes taisnā ceļā uz vulkānu! Lai viņu glābtu, arī Dorai nākas pacelties gaisā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli. Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā. Bērni kļūst par vecākiem, un vecāki - par bērniem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rouza rīko kempingu, bet Rabls baidās no tumsas. Draugi uzbūvē zvaigznes.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbavecāki ir pārsteigti, redzot arvien vairāk reklāmu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija nevar izlemt, ko dāvināt omītei. Tims uzņem pats savu Kapteiņa Dinozvaigznes filmu. Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī apmetas migrējošu pīļu bars. Rabla komandai jāpalīdz pīlēm uzsākt ceļu uz dienvidiem. Motore nevēlas doties pie dakteres Divas uz veterināro klīniku... tāpēc ķepaiņi uzbūvē īpašu, tikai viņai paredzētu telpu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku. Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami. Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili. Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa dodas uz zebras Zojas pidžamu ballīti kopā ar aitiņu Sūziju, trusīti Rebeku, kaķenīti Kendiju un zilonīti Emīliju. Meitenes spēlē spēles un izklaidējas. Beidzot viņām uznāk miegs. Viņas iekārtojas guļammaisos un aizmieg.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns domā, ka neiederas ne ar suņiem, ne haizivīm, ne cilvēkiem, bet Makss viņu uzmundrina.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Makss ir ieplānojis jautru dienu ar Haizivsuni, bet Haizivsuns ir izklaidīgs, jo ir atradis karti, kas var aizvest pie citiem haizivsuņiem!

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Draudzības diena! Kad Ātrmeistara dāvana Makrupuča kungam noiet greizi, viņam jālūdz Rabla komandas palīdzība. Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.
